# Grants Bridge Ukraine - Frontend

## Project Overview

**Vue 3 + Tailwind CSS frontend** for the Grant Discovery Platform, rebranded as "Grants Bridge Ukraine" with Editorial Precision design aesthetic specifically tailored for Ukrainian civil society organizations.

**Live URL:** https://edf5b48b.grant-discovery-frontend.pages.dev
**Backend API:** https://grant-discovery.dieter-meier82.workers.dev
**Supabase:** https://adpddtbsstunjotxaldb.supabase.co

**Current Version:** 2.0.0 (Editorial Precision)

---

## Quick Reference

### Development
```bash
npm install          # Install dependencies
npm run dev          # Start dev server (localhost:5173)
npm run build        # Build for production
```

### Deployment
```bash
npx wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name=grant-discovery-frontend
```

### Key Files
- `src/views/auth/` - Authentication pages (Login, Register, Callback)
- `src/stores/auth.ts` - Pinia auth store
- `src/style.css` - Component library (buttons, cards, badges)
- `tailwind.config.js` - Design system configuration
- `.env.production` - Supabase credentials

---

## Design System: Editorial Precision

**Aesthetic:** Magazine-quality sophistication with Ukrainian national symbols

### Color Palette
```javascript
Navy:   #0f172a (primary dark)
Amber:  #f59e0b (accent warm)
Sage:   #10b981 (success green)
Stone:  #f5f5f4 (background)
Ukraine: Blue (#3b82f6) → Yellow (#f59e0b) gradient
```

### Typography
- **Display:** Playfair Display - Editorial headlines
- **Body:** DM Sans - Clean readability
- **Code:** JetBrains Mono - Technical content

### Component Classes
```css
/* Buttons */
.btn-primary        /* Navy, white text, hover lift */
.btn-secondary      /* Amber, glow effect */
.btn-outline        /* Bordered, transparent */

/* Cards */
.card               /* Standard white card */
.card-premium       /* Gradient background */
.grant-card         /* Grant-specific styling */

/* Badges */
.badge-success      /* Sage green */
.badge-warning      /* Amber */
.badge-info         /* Navy */

/* Animations */
.animate-fade-in    /* Smooth entrance */
.animate-slide-up   /* Upward motion */
```

---

## Authentication (Supabase)

### Auth Store Methods
```typescript
authStore.login(email, password)
authStore.signup(email, password, fullName)
authStore.loginWithGoogle()
authStore.logout()
authStore.accessToken  // JWT for backend API
```

### Database Tables (PostgreSQL)
```sql
user_profiles       /* Extended user data */
cso_profiles        /* Organization profiles */
cso_team_members    /* Multi-user teams */
```

### Setup Status
- ✅ Frontend code complete
- ✅ Supabase client configured
- ⚠️ **Requires manual SQL migration** - See `AUTH_SETUP_GUIDE.md`
